医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
使用瑞普替尼和手术治疗复发性胃肠道间质瘤2023 年 9 月 20 日，《Oncoscience》（第 10 卷）发表了一篇新病例报告，题为“使用开关控制激酶抑制剂瑞普替尼和手术对携带 KIT 外显子 11 突变的复发性胃肠道间质瘤进行多学科治疗”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Using-ripretinib-and-surgery-to-manage-recurrent-胃肠道-间质-肿瘤.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Using-ripretinib-and-surgery-to-manage-recurrent-胃肠道间质肿瘤.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a00fc7a4-c005-49a4-b5e3-c337149ef7b1 Fri, 03 Nov 2023 16:42:00 -0500 Using ripretinib and surgery to manage recurrent gastrointestinal stromal tumor
发现对抗心血管疾病的新途径明尼苏达大学医学院领导的研究确定了对抗心血管疾病的新途径。该研究最近发表在《自然心血管研究》上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/New-pathway-to-combat-cardioangio-disease-identified.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/New-pathway-to-combat-cardioangio-disease-identified.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0c162e85-7d7f-4f32-994a-873da4b4c42e Fri, 03 Nov 2023 16:30:00 -0500 New pathway to combat cardiovascular disease identified
研究发现英国在获得精神病早期心理干预方面存在种族差异伦敦大学学院研究人员领导的一项新研究发现，在英国，如果首次经历精神病发作的人来自少数民族背景，那么他们接受早期心理干预的可能性较小。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Study-finds-ethnic-disparities-in-access-to-early-psychological-interventions-for-psychosis-in-England.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Study-finds-ethnic-disparities-in-access-to-early-psychological-interventions-for-psychosis-in-England.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b8dcc64-b2cb-41c3-b1bf-21a032da0fd1 Fri, 03 Nov 2023 14:58:00 -0500 Study finds ethnic disparities in access to early psychological interventions for psychosis in England
吸烟会导致有害的 DNA 突变，从而破坏抗癌保障措施安大略省癌症研究所 (OICR) 的科学家发现了吸烟导致癌症的一种方式，并通过破坏人体的抗癌保障措施使癌症变得更难治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Tobacco-smoking-undermines-anti-cancer-safeguards-by-causing-harmful-DNA-mutations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Tobacco-smoking-undermines-anti-cancer-safeguards-by-causing-harmful-DNA-mutations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b5e44834-3d6b-4bd0-9ec6-e7133f3caa98 Fri, 03 Nov 2023 14:52:00 -0500 Tobacco smoking undermines anti-cancer safeguards by causing harmful DNA mutations
研究表明，运动的一些有益作用可能是由免疫系统驱动的自从 20 世纪早期的一项研究显示波士顿马拉松运动员赛后血液中的白细胞激增以来，运动与炎症之间的联系一直吸引着研究人员的想象力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Some-beneficial-effects-of-exercise-may-be-driven-by-the-immune-system-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Some-beneficial-effects-of-exercise-may-be-driven-by-the-immune-system-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7851b23f-bc0a-4f44-ab05-afa1f19db215 Fri, 03 Nov 2023 14:45:00 -0500 Some beneficial effects of exercise may be driven by the immune system, study suggests
受蝴蝶启发的成像传感器可以高精度检测癌细胞我们的星球上有许多生物比人类拥有更先进的感官。海龟可以感知地球的磁场。螳螂虾可以检测偏振光。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Butterfly-inspired-imaging-sensor-can-detect-cancer-cells-with-high-accuracy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Butterfly-inspired-imaging-sensor-can-detect-cancer-cells-with-high-accuracy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d30e6499-e395-41eb-a332-33e59eb87080 Fri, 03 Nov 2023 14:38:00 -0500 Butterfly-inspired imaging sensor can detect cancer cells with high accuracy
研究：自大流行以来，疗养院受到就业下降的不利影响最大密歇根大学的一位研究人员表示，在医疗保健工作领域中，自大流行以来，疗养院受到就业增长下降的不利影响最严重，其影响程度是医院或医生办公室的三倍多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Study-Nursing-homes-most-adversely-affected-by-employment-declines-since-the-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Study-Nursing-homes-most-adversely-affected-by-employment-declines-since-the-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c13ab81c-45aa-4ee6-bf3b-e20da7d2ad19 Fri, 03 Nov 2023 14:05:00 -0500 Study: Nursing homes most adversely affected by employment declines since the pandemic
美国牙科阿片类药物处方量下降，但大流行减缓了进展2023 年 11 月 3 日密歇根大学的一项研究显示，如今在美国接受拔牙或其他痛苦牙科手术的美国人获得阿片类止痛药的可能性远低于几年前。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Dental-opioid-prescribing-declines-in-the-US-but-pandemic-slows-progressNovember-3-2023.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Dental-opioid-prescribing-declines-in-the-US-but-pandemic-slows-progressNovember-3-2023.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30626659-9f05-48d9-ab2d-963f4f401b9e Fri, 03 Nov 2023 13:59:00 -0500 Dental opioid prescribing declines in the U.S., but pandemic slows progressNovember 3, 2023
WFIRM 宣布成功续签其本科生研究经验网站补助金维克森林再生医学研究所 (WFIRM) 很高兴地宣布美国国家科学基金会 (NSF) 成功续签其本科生研究经验 (REU) 站点资助。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/WFIRM-announces-successful-renewal-of-its-Research-Experiences-for-Undergraduates-Site-grant.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/WFIRM-announces-successful-renewal-of-its-Research-Experiences-for-Undergraduates-Site-grant.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=97cf4a02-30be-4ddb-9298-86357f0e2cc5 Fri, 03 Nov 2023 13:53:00 -0500 WFIRM announces successful renewal of its Research Experiences for Undergraduates Site grant
新技术有助于“可视化”活胚胎组织内的渗透压为了生存，生物体必须控制其内部的压力，从单细胞水平到组织和器官。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/New-technique-helps-visualize-osmotic-Pressure-within-living-embryonic-tissues.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/New-technique-helps-visualize-osmotic-Pressure-within-living-embryonic-tissues.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd6cc085-cbb3-4e03-8e8e-b3c9409b0967 Fri, 03 Nov 2023 13:48:00 -0500 New technique helps 'visualize' osmotic pressure within living embryonic tissues
